beer.beer_description:
Who doesn’t like creamy
chocolate, strong coffee, fragrant spices and a bit of chilli pepper heat? We know you do, but
beware, so does the Chupacabra!

Contains barley malt, oat flakes, lactose, cocoa nibs, coffee, cinnamon, nutmeg, vanilla bean, Habanero peppers and hops.

items.checkin_comment: Very chocolatey with a very thick mouthfeel. Unfortunately the finish is very acidic/sulfury.
Hop Hooligans? More like, Malt Misfits.

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 225 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 46!

beer.beer_description:

items.checkin_comment: Man, it's spicy! And mango is kinda fermented....

beer.beer_description:
Step out of range of the lifeless broadcast of your daily routine and choose a different type of manipulation. Try our own special type of Crowd Control.
Achieve hop bliss.

Contains barley malt, wheat malt, oat flakes and hops.

Our English "Very Special" Bitter was first brewed in accordance with an old king's secret recipe, and had an uncommon ingredient, the japanese hop Sorachi Ace. But these type of things can't really be tolerated in Great Britain, so the king soon... lost his head. We hope he at least had a Royal Execution!

Contains barley malt and hops.

Step out of range of the lifeless broadcast of your daily routine and choose a different type of manipulation. Try our own special type of Crowd Control.
Achieve hop bliss.

Contains barley malt, wheat malt, oat flakes and hops.

items.checkin_comment: Totally worth it! A lovely bitter,  hoppy kick.

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 65 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 14!

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 5 different beers that been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 2!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 75 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 16!

beer.beer_description:
Be careful with what you hold now in your hands. There's so much coconut jammed into this bottle that it's actually a safety hazard. Don't take your eyes off it or you might end up getting blown away by a fiery volley of Cannon Fire!

Contains barley malt, oat flakes, coconut, cocoa nibs and hops.

user.bio: A broad range alcoholic-whisky, wine, rum, and a beginner beer geek.

items.comment: Есть че пить-то в Бухаресте? А то с таким названием город...

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 240 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 49!
It takes the perfect amount light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 200 check-ins with a photo.

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 5 different beers that been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 2!
